document_data.name: Maximilian's Earthen Grasp
document_data.mainbody: '''''Maximilian's earthen grasp''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that caused the [[Earth (element)|earth]] itself to grab and restrain a target.
document_data.Effects:
The spell caused a [[human]]-sized hand made of compacted earth to appear within a range of {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} from the caster. It then grabbed a specified target creature, restraining and crushing it. The hand could be directed to move to a new target within range and lasted for up to one minute, as long as the caster kept concentrating on the spell.

The spell did not work in [[wildspace]] or in the [[phlogiston]], since there was no earth from which the hand could emerge.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s. The material required was a miniature hand sculpted in [[clay]],
document_data.Notable Users: * The [[great ghul]] sorcerer [[Dahshur]] utilized a self-modified version of ''earthen grasp'' that they referred to as ''Dahshur's sandy grasp''.<ref>
